name: Retro Shooter (SavanDev)
description:
Made for #LOWREZJAM 2020.

A short arcade game where you will have to go through the different rooms eliminating the enemies that cross your path.

Also, the game has Gamepad and Joystick support.

Keyboard Gamepad / USB Joystick Move WASD or Up / Down Left stick Rotate Left / Right Right stick Interact E Y / Triangle Shoot Space Right Shoulder (Gamepad)
R1 (Joystick) Run Left shift Left Shoulder (Gamepad)
L1 (Joystick) Pause Enter / Return Start Exit game Escape Screenshot F2 Third-party assets

Eazy Sound Manager >> Hellmade (Asset Store)

FREE Music Loop Bundle >> Tallbeard Studios (itch.io)

300+ NINTENDO SFX Pack >> GameSupplyGuy (itch.io)

Simple FX >> Synty Studios (Asset Store)
